The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 January is 3,248,215 (5,770.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 22 January, there were 217,579 new confirmed cases (386.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 January, there were 281,014 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 23% (63,435 fewer cases).
